testcase.name: verify that adding removing items and updating cart
testcase.system-out: Given The user is on the JPetStore SignInpage...............................passed When The user signs in with username and password...........................passed And The user clicks on the cart image.......................................passed Then The user should be redirected to the view cart page....................passed And The cart page display Your cart is empty message when there is no items in cart.passed When The user clicks on Fish................................................passed Then The user should redirected to the fish category page...................passed When The user clicks on product id..........................................passed Then The user should be redirected to the items page of that product........passed When The user clicks on add to cart button which is next to item price......passed Then The product should be added to the cart and redirected to view cart page.passed And Add items to cart again.................................................passed And set quantity of item and click updateCart...............................passed Then Click on Check out process button......................................passed And Close Browser...........................................................passed
